info.description: Inventory Service for managing Items and Stock
info.title: Inventory Service API

get.description: Get a list of customers. Supports both pagination styles: page/size or limit/offset

post.description: Generate a password reset token for the user

get.description: Get a list of items. Supports both pagination styles: page/size or limit/offset
Get stock information for an item

put.description: Adjust stock quantity for an item (positive to increase, negative to decrease)

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Register a new user with email, password, and role
Reset user password using reset token

get.description: Get a list of vendors. Supports both pagination styles: page/size or limit/offset

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token. Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
